function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data entry errors in the measurement values","Impact":"Inaccurate data analysis and conclusions","Mitigation":"Implement double-entry verification for data input","Technologies":"Automated data entry systems","People":"Data entry personnel","Owner":"Data analysis team"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of statistical values","Impact":"Incorrect conclusions and decision-making","Mitigation":"Provide training on statistical analysis and interpretation","Technologies":"Statistical software with built-in guidance","People":"Data analysts and researchers","Owner":"Research and analysis team"},{"Description":"Insufficient data validation and quality control","Impact":"Unreliable results and findings","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous data validation processes and quality control checks","Technologies":"Data validation software and quality control tools","People":"Data collection and analysis team","Owner":"Quality control and assurance team"}]}
